means: 发音，读(pronounce的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: He walked around the garden and pronounced himself satisfied.
sentence.Network_cn: 他绕着花园走了走，说自己很满意。

sentence.Network_en: The aquifer which had once fed the wells was pronounced dry.
sentence.Network_cn: 曾为水井供水的蓄水层正式宣告干涸了。

sentence.Network_en: "Getting nowhere fast," pronounced Crosby, "that's what we're doing."
sentence.Network_cn: 克罗斯比断言说：“我们一无所获，在做无用功。”

PerfectNetExp.abs: 基本释义pronounced 显著的,明确的prond的海词问答与网友补充：
promise n. (前途有)希望;(有)指望pronounced adj. 决然的，断然的，强硬的;明白的，显着的。provide v. 规定
...h as terrorism and trans-boundary crimes are quitepronounced（明显的）.4. 一年来，世界经济虽然有所复苏，但受周期性和结构性问题的影响，复苏步伐比较缓慢。.
prononciert〔德〕发音清晰、明确的。pronounced〔英〕同上。prontamente〔意〕敏捷地，及时地，迅速地。.

entry.def: Something that is pronounced is very noticeable.

example.ex: Most of the art exhibitions have a  pronounced Scottish theme.
example.tran: 大多数的艺术展品带有明显的苏格兰风格。

means.word_mean: 2. produced by the organs of speech

auth_sentence.content: Nowhere is that opposition more pronounced than in Finland.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nowhere is that opposition more pronounced than in Finland.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nowhere is that opposition more pronounced than in Finland.

auth_sentence.content: She was always changing the way it was pronounced.
auth_sentence.res_content: She was always changing the way it was pronounced.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She was always changing the way it was pronounced.

auth_sentence.content: He tested my heart and pronounced me constitutionally fit.
auth_sentence.res_content: He tested my heart and pronounced me constitutionally fit.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He tested my heart and pronounced me constitutionally fit.

stems_affixes.word_buile: announce[v.通告]+ment表名词→n.布告,通告;声明,预告
an一再+nounce通知→一再通知→通告

stems_affixes.value_cn: 公开指责,公然抨击;谴责
stems_affixes.word_buile: de坏+nounce讲话,说出→讲坏话→抨击

stems_affixes.value_cn: 公开指责,公然抨击,谴责
stems_affixes.word_buile: denounce[v.公开指责,公然抨击;谴责]+ate表动词→v.公开指责,公然抨击,谴责
pro在前+nounce讲话,说出→在[嘴]前讲话→发音
re反+nounce讲话,说出→反过来说→否认

Sentence.sentence: The problem is pronounced at public universities.

sentences.en: She speaks with a pronounced French accent.
sentences.cn: 她说话有明显的法国口音。
